justification: Participants completed the novelty seeking dimension of the Tridimensional Personality Questionnaire (TPQ-NS) during an online session to measure novelty seeking traits.
The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI-T) was used to assess trait anxiety, with its scores showing significant negative correlations with specific brain components in the SBM analysis.
The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI-S) was utilized to measure state anxiety, although it did not show significant correlations with the isolated components from SBM in this study.
